title: Can install, client wont load.
body: Lol logo will pop up but wont get past the lol logo with the loading bar underneath it . anyone know why?

replies.body: You may only need to adjust a couple settings to make sure that your OS recognizes League as a safe program. Go through this guide on [**updating your permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get back on the Rift!
